body_html: How are you installing tensorflow? The current prebuilt binaries 1.5 and 1.6 are built against CUDA 9.0 so you will need this version of CUDA installed. You can use CUDA 9.1 if you compile tensorflow from source and specify that version during the configuration step.
body_text: How are you installing tensorflow? The current prebuilt binaries 1.5 and 1.6 are built against CUDA 9.0 so you will need this version of CUDA installed. You can use CUDA 9.1 if you compile tensorflow from source and specify that version during the configuration step.
body: How are you installing tensorflow? The current prebuilt binaries 1.5 and 1.6 are built against CUDA 9.0 so you will need this version of CUDA installed. You can use CUDA 9.1 if you compile tensorflow from source and specify that version during the configuration step.
